billing.question: How does billing work?
billing.answer: Billing is done monthly and renews automatically. You can cancel at any time.

refund.question: What is your refund policy?
refund.answer: We offer a 100% money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied within the first 14 days.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade my package?
upgrade.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your package at any time. The price difference will be reflected in the next billing period.

cta.title: Get Started Now
cta.description: Start your Etsy success journey today. First 14 days free!

start.question: How do I get started with eTutors?
start.answer: After signing up for eTutors, you can choose the package that suits you best...

payment.question: What are the payment methods?
payment.answer: You can pay with credit card, debit card, and bank transfer...

change.question: Can I change my package?
change.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your package at any time. Changes will take effect in the next billing period.

delivery.question: How do you deliver the designs?
delivery.answer: All designs are delivered in high-resolution PNG and editable PSD format, downloadable from your personal dashboard.

footer.description: Professional platform providing digital solutions for Etsy sellers.

cookie.title: Cookie Usage
cookie.description: We use cookies to provide you with a better experience. You can review our cookie policy and update your preferences.
cookie.necessary_desc: Essential cookies required for the site to function.
cookie.analytics_desc: Cookies that help us understand how you use our site.
cookie.marketing_desc: Cookies that help us show you personalized ads.

hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: and Mission
hero.description: We started in 2020 to meet the needs of Etsy sellers. Today, as a platform serving more than 10,000 sellers, we are part of Etsy sellers' success stories every day.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We follow the latest technologies and trends in the ever-evolving e-commerce world.

trust.title: Trust
trust.desc: We build transparent and trust-based relationships with our customers.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: We aim for the highest quality standards in all our services.

contact.title: Get in Touch

hero.title: How Can We Help You?
hero.description: We're here with FAQs, tutorial videos, and our support team.

start.question: How do I start using eTutors?
start.answer: After signing up, you can access your personal dashboard and start using it right away. Our getting started guide will help you.

templates.question: How can I customize templates?
templates.answer: Our templates are provided in Photoshop and Canva formats. Each template comes with a detailed customization guide.

seo.question: How should I use SEO tags?
seo.answer: SEO tags are optimized specifically for your product. You can get more views by adding the tags to your Etsy listing.
